articles.description: William Shatner took to Twitter on Friday to respond to George Takei's comments about him and the Blue Origin spaceflight.
articles.content:
William Shatner criticized his former "Star Trek" co-star George Takei, who called Shatner a "guinea pig" and "unfit" following his Blue Origin spaceflight.
Shatner shared a pointed Twitter post dir… [+2325 chars]

articles.title: Leila George files for divorce from Sean Penn after one year of marriage - USA TODAY
articles.description: Actress and philanthropist Leila George, whose legal name is Leila D'Onofrio, filed for dissolution from Sean Penn on Friday.
articles.content:
Sean Penn and his wife are calling it quits.

articles.title: Michael Caine clarifies statement on retiring after latest film - Page Six
articles.description: Despite stating otherwise in a radio interview, the actor with six decades of credits under his belt says there’s still room for more.
articles.content:
Michael Caine has not retired from acting just yet.
